comments:
Build 20030826

While running the RemoteAttachTests class, the following was dumped to the 
console:

!ENTRY org.eclipse.debug.core 4 120 Aug 26, 2003 12:31:16.186
!MESSAGE An exception occurred while dispatching debug events.
!STACK 0
java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.jdt.internal.debug.ui.console.JavaConsoleTracker.
lineAppended(JavaConsoleTracker.java:49)
	at org.eclipse.debug.internal.ui.views.console.ConsoleLineNotifier.
processNewLines(ConsoleLineNotifier.java:112)
	at org.eclipse.debug.internal.ui.views.console.ConsoleLineNotifier.
handleDebugEvents(ConsoleLineNotifier.java:146)
	at org.eclipse.debug.core.DebugPlugin$EventNotifier.run(DebugPlugin.java:
858)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.runtime.InternalPlatform.run(InternalPlatform.
java:1016)
	at org.eclipse.core.runtime.Platform.run(Platform.java:420)
	at org.eclipse.debug.core.DebugPlugin$EventNotifier.dispatch(DebugPlugin.
java:890)
	at org.eclipse.debug.core.DebugPlugin.fireDebugEventSet(DebugPlugin.java:
306)
	at org.eclipse.debug.internal.core.RuntimeProcess.fireEvent(RuntimeProcess.
java:253)
	at org.eclipse.debug.internal.core.RuntimeProcess.
fireTerminateEvent(RuntimeProcess.java:261)
	at org.eclipse.debug.internal.core.RuntimeProcess.
terminated(RuntimeProcess.java:219)
	at org.eclipse.debug.internal.core.ProcessMonitorJob.run(ProcessMonitorJob.
java:51)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:61)

I am unable to reproduce this problem. It looks like (in order for this to 
happen), the console document must be disposed in a different thread, while 
line notification is occurring in the another thread.

Marking as wontfix unless we have a reproduceable case - it may be a test suite 
oddity (I have not seen this in practice). In any case, the bug was handled 
gracefully by the debug event dispatcher.
